mapper.sql: id, user_id, log_level, operate_time, operate_type, broswer
mapper.insert: insert into sys_log (id, user_id, log_level, operate_time, operate_type, broswer, log_content, note) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{logLevel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{broswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update sys_log
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR},
log_level = #{logLevel,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
broswer = #{broswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
log_content = #{logContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
